### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole at position (12.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole at position (15.5, 15.5)
- Electric pole at position (11.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole at position (20.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole at position (9.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole at position (10.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to use furnaces. Check the required items for smelting and ensure they are available.

### Errors related to lab power supply
- Make sure the lab is connected to a power source. Check the electricity network to ensure that power is being supplied to the lab.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target location.
